name: Project RCG
description:
Project RCG is a 2D platformer where the player’s controls progressively randomise to the point where none of them serve the same purpose anymore and the player needs to keep relearning the control scheme of the game to keep proceeding. The game is intended to evoke feelings of frustration and exasperation by repeatedly mixing up the controls and disorienting the player in this way.

This game started being developed as a prototype to test a hypothesis for the User Experience section of our 2nd Year Game Design course at the Academy of Interactive Entertainment.
